content.rendered:
Directed by Shujaat Saudagar.

Written by Pubali Chaudhuri. Farhan Akhtar.

Cast Farhan Akhtar(Aditya Shroff). Shraddha Kapoor(Jiah Sharma). Arjun Rampal(Joseph Mascarenhas). Purab Kohli(Kedar Zaveri / KD). Prachi Desai(Sakshi Shroff). Shashank Arora(Uday). Shahana Goswami(Debbie Mascarenhas) . Akshay Bhagat(secretary of Villain). Naveen Bhagiya(Self – Bartender).Vishal Dadlani. Manka Kaur(Pavitra). Luke Kenny(Rob Nancy). Dinesh Kumar(Mann Jyot).Salim Merchant. Kumud Mishra(Pandit Vibhuti Sharma). Naveen(Bartender).Omkaar. Priyanshu Painyuli(Jiah’s Brother). Hetal Puniwala(Accountant). Shashank Qazi(Joseph Mascarenhas’s Friend).Keshav Uppal. Usha Uthup(Self)

Language Hindi.

Producers Farhan Akhtar. Vikesh Bhutani. Ashit Ghelani. Md Anan Islam. Arif Mir. Ritesh Sidhwani.

Production Excel Entertainment.
